long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spaces is a Chrome extension that helps you organize your browsing with multiple Spaces and folders. Save, manage, and restore your tabs efficiently.


🚀 Create Spaces for different activities like work, personal, research, and hobbies.
  ⭐️ Easily switch between Spaces for focused browsing.
Nested Folders:

🚀 Organize tabs within Spaces using folders.
  ⭐️ Name folders to categorize tabs by project or topic.

🚀 Save and Restore Tabs:
  ⭐️ Restore tabs anytime to continue where you left off.

🚀 Drag and Drop:
  ⭐️ Move tabs between folders with drag-and-drop.
  ⭐️ Reorganize tabs to fit your workflow.

🚀 Search Functionality:
  ⭐️ Search for specific tabs within a Space

🚀 Customizable Settings:
  ⭐️ Customize Spaces with colors and icons.

Spaces helps you manage your tabs and boost productivity. Download now to organize your digital workspace!
